item.title: Clarke Quay Restaurant Week offers exclusive meals at discounted prices
item.description: Clarke Quay’s inaugural Restaurant Week kicks off on Monday, April 20th, and continues until Sunday, May 3rd. This extended “week” offers diners the chance to savor exclusive set lunches priced at S$35++ or S$45++ by booking directly with participating Clarke Quay restaurants. Source: Clarke Quay. For instance, RAS The Essence of India presents a five-course set lunch featuring dishes like banajara kebab, lamb rogan gosht, boondhi raita, and rasmalai for S$35++.
